name: Mojito
directions: In a cocktail shaker, muddle the fresh mint leaves with the lime juice and simple syrup until the mint is fragrant and slightly crushed.
Add the white rum and a handful of crushed ice to the shaker and shake until well combined.
Strain the mixture into a tall glass filled with ice.
Top up the glass with soda water and give it a gentle stir.
Garnish with a sprig of fresh mint and a lime wedge.
Enjoy your refreshing Mojito!

name: White Russian
directions: Fill a rocks glass with ice.
Add the vodka and coffee liqueur to the glass.
Stir gently to combine.
Pour the heavy cream over the top of the vodka and coffee liqueur.
Serve and enjoy!

name: Old Fashioned
directions: In an Old Fashioned glass, add the sugar and bitters.
Add a splash of water and stir until the sugar is dissolved.
Add a large ice cube to the glass.
Pour in the bourbon whiskey and stir until well combined.
Garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry.
Serve and enjoy your classic Old Fashioned cocktail!

name: Sex On The Beach
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Add the vodka, peach schnapps, orange juice, and cranberry juice to the shaker.
Shake well until chilled.
Strain the mixture into a tall glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a slice of orange.
Serve and enjoy!

name: Espresso Martini
directions: Brew a shot of espresso and let it cool down to room temperature.
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Add the vodka, coffee liqueur, simple syrup, and cooled espresso to the shaker.
Shake vigorously for about 10 seconds.
Strain the cocktail into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with a few coffee beans on top.

name: New York Sour
ingredients: 15 ml red wine (preferably a full-bodied red)
directions: Fill a shaker with ice.
Add the whiskey, lemon juice, and simple syrup to the shaker.
Shake well until chilled.
Strain the mixture into a rocks glass filled with ice.
Gently pour the red wine over the back of a spoon held just above the drink's surface so it floats on top.
Garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Aperol Spritz
directions: Fill a large wine glass with ice.
Add the Aperol and Prosecco to the glass.
Top with soda water and gently stir to combine.
Garnish with an orange slice and serve immediately.

name: Martini
ingredients: Lemon twist or olive for garnish
directions: Fill a mixing glass or shaker with ice.
Pour in the gin and dry vermouth.
Stir for about 30 seconds until well chilled.
Strain the mixture into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist or olive.

name: Whiskey Sour
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Add the whiskey, fresh lemon juice, and simple syrup to the shaker.
Shake vigorously for about 10-15 seconds, until the shaker is frosty and cold.
Strain the cocktail into a rocks glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Tequila Sunrise
ingredients: Orange slice and cherry for garnish
directions: Fill a tall glass with ice cubes.
Pour in the tequila and orange juice.
Stir well to combine.
Slowly pour in the grenadine syrup over the back of a spoon so that it sinks to the bottom of the glass.
Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.
Serve and enjoy your Tequila Sunrise!

name: Manhattan
directions: Fill a mixing glass with ice.
Add the whiskey, sweet vermouth, and bitters to the mixing glass.
Stir the ingredients together until they are well combined and chilled.
Strain the cocktail into a chilled glass.
Garnish with a maraschino cherry.
Serve and enjoy!

name: Mimosa
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes.
Add the champagne, freshly squeezed orange juice, and triple sec to the shaker.
Shake well for about 10 seconds to combine the ingredients.
Strain the mixture into a chilled champagne flute.
Garnish with a twist of orange peel.
Serve and enjoy your delicious Mimosa cocktail!

name: Black Russian
directions: Fill a rocks glass with ice.
Add the vodka and coffee liqueur to the glass.
Stir gently until well combined.
Garnish with a cherry or a twist of orange peel, if desired.
Serve and enjoy!

name: Snowball
directions: In a cocktail shaker, combine vodka, lime juice, simple syrup, and egg white.
Add ice cubes to the shaker and shake vigorously for about 10 seconds.
Strain the mixture into a glass filled with ice cubes.
Top with sparkling water.
Garnish with coconut flakes.

name: Cosmopolitan
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes.
Add the vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and lime juice to the shaker.
Shake the ingredients vigorously for about 10-15 seconds.
Strain the mixture into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish the cocktail with a lime twist.
Serve and enjoy your delicious Cosmopolitan!

name: Negroni
directions: Fill a mixing glass with ice.
Add gin, sweet vermouth, and Campari to the mixing glass.
Stir until well-chilled.
Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a twist of orange peel.

name: Tom Collins
directions: Fill a Collins glass with ice.
Pour in the gin, fresh lemon juice, and simple syrup.
Stir well to combine.
Top up the glass with soda water and stir again.
Garnish with a lemon slice and serve.

name: Cuba Libre
directions: Fill a highball glass with ice.
Add the white rum and fresh lime juice to the glass.
Top with cola and stir gently.
Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Daiquiri
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes.
Add the white rum, lime juice, and simple syrup to the shaker.
Shake well until chilled.
Strain the mixture into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Screwdriver
directions: Fill a highball glass with ice.
Pour in the vodka and orange juice.
Stir well.
Garnish with a slice of orange, if desired.
Serve and enjoy!

name: Sazerac
directions: Chill an Old Fashioned glass by filling it with ice and water.
In a separate mixing glass, add the rye whiskey, simple syrup, and Peychaud's bitters.
Fill the mixing glass with ice and stir until well chilled.
Discard the ice and water from the Old Fashioned glass, and rinse it with absinthe, making sure to coat the entire inside of the glass.
Strain the cocktail into the absinthe-rinsed glass.
Express the oils from the lemon peel over the drink, and use it as a garnish.

name: Paloma
directions: Fill a tall glass with ice cubes.
Add tequila and lime juice to the glass.
Top up with grapefruit soda.
Add a pinch of salt and stir gently.
Garnish with a slice of grapefruit.
Serve and enjoy your Paloma cocktail!

name: Moscow Mule
directions: Fill a copper mug or highball glass with ice.
Add the vodka and lime juice to the glass.
Top up the glass with ginger beer.
Stir gently to combine all the ingredients.
Garnish with a lime wedge and serve immediately.

name: Sidecar
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Add cognac, triple sec, and fresh lemon juice to the shaker.
Shake well until the shaker is frosty.
Strain the mixture into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Martinez
directions: Fill a mixing glass with ice.
Add the gin, sweet vermouth, maraschino liqueur, and orange bitters.
Stir well for about 20 seconds until the mixture is well chilled.
Strain the cocktail into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with a twist of orange peel.

name: Pisco Sour
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Add the Pisco, fresh lime juice, simple syrup, and egg white to the shaker.
Shake vigorously for about 10-15 seconds.
Strain the mixture into a glass.
Add a few drops of Angostura bitters on top of the foam.
Garnish with a slice of lime or a cherry, if desired.
Serve and enjoy!

name: French 75
ingredients: 15 ml simple syrup (1:1 sugar and water)
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Add the gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup to the shaker.
Shake well until chilled.
Strain the mixture into a champagne flute or coupe glass.
Top with sparkling wine.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Mint Julep
directions: In a julep cup or highball glass, muddle the mint leaves and simple syrup together until the mint is fragrant.
Fill the glass with crushed ice.
Pour the bourbon over the ice and stir gently until the glass is frosted on the outside.
Garnish with a sprig of fresh mint.

name: Last Word
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Add the gin, green Chartreuse, maraschino liqueur, and fresh lime juice to the shaker.
Shake well for about 10-15 seconds.
Strain the mixture into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lime wheel.
Serve and enjoy your Last Word cocktail!

name: Irish Coffee
directions: Brew a cup of hot coffee and set it aside.
In a separate glass, add the Irish whiskey and simple syrup.
Pour the hot coffee into the glass and stir to combine.
In a separate container, shake the heavy cream until it becomes slightly thickened.
Gently pour the cream over the back of a spoon onto the top of the coffee mixture, allowing it to float on top.
Serve hot and enjoy your delicious Irish Coffee!

name: Gin Fizz
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Add the gin, fresh lemon juice, and simple syrup to the shaker.
Shake the mixture vigorously for about 10-15 seconds.
Strain the mixture into a tall glass filled with ice.
Top the glass with soda water and gently stir.
Garnish with a lemon twist and serve immediately.

name: Bloody Mary
ingredients: Celery stalk and lemon wedge, for garnish
directions: Fill a shaker with ice.
Add the vodka, tomato juice, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, celery salt, and black pepper.
Shake the mixture vigorously for about 10 seconds.
Strain the mixture into a tall glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a celery stalk and lemon wedge.
Serve and enjoy your delicious Bloody Mary cocktail!

name: Gimlet
directions: Fill a shaker with ice.
Add gin, fresh lime juice, and simple syrup to the shaker.
Shake well until the shaker is frosty.
Strain the mixture into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Margarita
directions: Rim a cocktail glass with salt by rubbing a lime wedge around the rim of the glass and then dipping it into a small dish of salt.
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Add tequila, lime juice, Cointreau or triple sec, and simple syrup to the shaker.
Shake vigorously for about 10 seconds.
Strain the mixture into the salt-rimmed glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Boulevardier
directions: Fill a mixing glass with ice.
Add the bourbon, sweet vermouth, and Campari.
Stir until well chilled, about 30 seconds.
Strain the mixture into a chilled glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a twist of orange peel.

name: Dark & Stormy
ingredients: Blackberries and lime wedges for garnish
directions: In a cocktail shaker, combine the dark rum, blackberry liqueur, lime juice, simple syrup, and aromatic bitters.
Add ice to the shaker and shake vigorously for 10-15 seconds.
Strain the cocktail into a rocks glass filled with ice.
Garnish with fresh blackberries and a lime wedge.
Enjoy your delicious and refreshing "Dark" cocktail!

name: Long Island Iced Tea
directions: Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Add the vodka, gin, white rum, tequila, triple sec, lemon juice, and simple syrup to the shaker.
Shake vigorously for about 10 seconds.
Strain the mixture into a tall glass filled with ice cubes.
Top up the glass with cola.
Give the drink a quick stir.
Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

name: Kir Royale
directions: Chill a champagne flute in the freezer for 5-10 minutes.
Pour the crème de cassis into the chilled flute.
Slowly pour the champagne into the flute, taking care not to let it overflow.
Gently stir the cocktail with a bar spoon to combine the ingredients.
Garnish with a few fresh raspberries and serve immediately.

name: Mai Tai
ingredients: Mint sprig and lime wheel for garnish
directions: Fill a shaker with ice.
Pour in the dark rum, fresh lime juice, orange curaçao, and orgeat syrup.
Shake well until the outside of the shaker is frosty.
Strain the mixture into a glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a mint sprig and lime wheel.

name: Bellini
directions: In a blender, puree a fresh peach until smooth.
Add the peach puree and sugar to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake well.
Strain the mixture into a chilled champagne flute.
Top up the glass with Prosecco.
Garnish with a slice of fresh peach and serve.

name: Pina Colada
ingredients: Pineapple wedge and/or maraschino cherry for garnish
directions: Fill a blender with ice cubes.
Add the white rum, pineapple juice, coconut cream, and lime juice to the blender.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Pour the mixture into a glass.
Garnish with a pineapple wedge and/or maraschino cherry.
Serve and enjoy!

name: Greyhound
directions: Fill a glass with ice.
Pour in the grapefruit juice and vodka.
Stir gently to combine.
Garnish with a grapefruit wedge.
Serve and enjoy!

name: Strawberry Mojito
directions: In a cocktail shaker, muddle the sliced strawberries and mint leaves together until they are well mashed and fragrant.
Add the white rum, fresh lime juice, and simple syrup to the shaker.
Fill the shaker with ice and shake well until the ingredients are well combined and chilled.
Strain the mixture into a tall glass filled with ice.
Top up the glass with soda water.
Garnish with a fresh strawberry and mint sprig.
Serve and enjoy your refreshing Strawberry Mojito!

name: Passionfruit Mojito
directions: In a cocktail shaker, muddle the mint leaves with the lime juice and simple syrup.
Add the white rum and passionfruit puree to the shaker, and fill with ice.
Shake well for about 10-15 seconds.
Strain the mixture into a tall glass filled with ice.
Top with soda water and stir gently.
Garnish with a sprig of mint and a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Hazelnut Espresso Martini
directions: Add vodka, espresso, hazelnut liqueur, and simple syrup to a cocktail shaker.
Fill the shaker with ice.
Shake vigorously for about 10 seconds.
Strain the mixture into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with a few hazelnuts on top.
Serve and enjoy!

name: Cherry Sour
directions: In a cocktail shaker, muddle the cherries until they are broken down.
Add the gin, lemon juice, cherry liqueur, simple syrup, and egg white to the shaker.
Fill the shaker with ice and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds.
Strain the mixture into a glass filled with fresh ice.
Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Amaretto Cherry Sour
ingredients: 20 ml cherry syrup (you can use the syrup from a jar of maraschino cherries)
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Add the amaretto liqueur, fresh lemon juice, cherry syrup, and egg white to the shaker.
Shake vigorously for about 10-15 seconds until the egg white is frothy.
Strain the cocktail into a glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a maraschino cherry on top.

name: Bramble
directions: Fill a rocks glass with crushed ice.
In a cocktail shaker, combine the gin, lemon juice, and simple syruAdd ice and shake vigorously for about 10 seconds.
Strain the mixture over the ice in the rocks glass.
Drizzle the crème de mure over the top of the drink.
Garnish with fresh blackberries and serve with a straw.

name: Spicy Paloma
directions: Rim a highball glass with salt by rubbing a grapefruit wedge around the rim and dipping it in salt.
In a shaker, muddle 2-3 slices of jalapeño pepper.
Add tequila, fresh lime juice, agave syrup, and grapefruit juice to the shaker.
Fill the shaker with ice and shake vigorously for about 10-15 seconds.
Strain the cocktail into the salt-rimmed highball glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a grapefruit wedge and a slice of jalapeño pepper.

name: Cranberry Whiskey Sour
ingredients: Fresh cranberries and lemon slices for garnish
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Add the whiskey, cranberry juice, fresh lemon juice, and simple syrup to the shaker.
Shake well for about 10-15 seconds.
Strain the mixture into a glass filled with ice.
Garnish with fresh cranberries and lemon slices.
